overview:
Rajeev Dujari is Senior Vice President of Products at Earth Class Mail.

Rajeev is responsible for defining the product roadmap and helping ensure continued software innovation and operational efficiency that will accelerate the growth of Earth Class Mailâ€™s customer base, which includes individuals, small businesses, enterprises, government agencies, military branches, and national postal services.

Prior to Earth Class Mail, Rajeev worked for Microsoft. During his first 10 years at the company, he made key technical contributions to Microsoftâ€™s Windows operating system and five major releases of its Internet Explorer web browser, and he was an inventor on 12 issued patents. Rajeev led product units charged with delivering major advances to the companyâ€™s Exchange Server, Office Live Meeting, and Visual Studio products.

His areas of expertise include desktop clients, enterprise servers, hosted services and software platforms and tools, as well as staff recruiting, mentoring, team-building, and offshore project management.

He earned a B.S. in Electrical Engineering and a M.S. in Computer Science from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.

Source: Earth Class Mail
